name: OR_CASE_PAT_MD_REQ
description: The OR_CASE_PAT_MD_REQ table contains OR management system case patient/MD requests.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of patient/MD request information in the case.

columns.name: PAT_MD_REQ
columns.description: The patient/MD request information for the case.
